channel.title: [474] cfg item help
channel.description: how do i make a dupe of an item "rotten potato" then i can have the duped version like runescapes with the commands it gives you and how to dupe an item and give it 10000+stats but only owners can have it but the normal version anyone can have it but not the edited version sorry if you don't understand what im trying to say just message and ill try to make it clear

item.title: [474] cfg item help
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

You are trying to apply two different stats to the same item based on playerRights. This would not be changed in the cfg(it doesn’t support this kind of thing), rather in the code that handles the given bonus.

if (itemID == rot_tom && isOwner() && bonusIndex == STRENGTH) return 10000; else return bonus[bonusIndex];

Read full topic

item.title: [474] cfg item help
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“swiftclanhype, post:3, topic:546638”][quote author=gimpie link=topic=665535.msg4449196#msg4449196 date=1410386460]
To dupe it you need to make an item class and make it use the same models as the rotten potatoe, you proably want to look at a Custom item tutorial if you dont know how to do that. As for the stats im use to 718+ but for your revision im pretty sure there are item classes (like 1203.txt or 1103.txt) normally you just copy one and change the name to the id of the item, once you edit the stats in the file you may have to use an item bonus packer to Pack the stats.
[/quote]
thanks man this really helped[/quote]
No problem, let me know if it dosn’t work

Read full topic
